pipeline_events_track.help_text: Enable tracking of files created by the pipeline. Data will be stored in the pipeline events database.

pipeline_events_follow_links.help_text: Resolve the absolute path to any linked files created by the pipeline.

associate_batch_metadata.help_text: Track the metadata JSON for the pipeline run.

pipeline_events_container.help_text: Container to use to provide an API to allow pipeline event tracking.
